Case Studies

Harbor Alert

Measuring and mapping water health and pollution in the Baltimore Harbor

Baltimore Harbor Waterkeeper, a program of Blue Water Baltimore, has developed an Ambient Water Quality Monitoring Program to collect scientifically-rigorous and legally-defensible water-quality data.

Live project
Project Team
  • John Dawes
  • Ryan Hamley
  • Joshua Powell
Project Partners
  • Chesapeake Commons
  • Blue Water Baltimore

Come Work With Us

Viable Industries is a cause-driven digital creative studio. We’re passionate about empowering organizations with web and mobile technologies that use their data to spark public engagement and fuel smarter problem-solving.
